original: Garrick Pierce sent you a letter. But the paper is torn in the middle. The contents read as such: “I hope you understand... I would've never contacted you unless I had no other choice. I know the truth behind McCoy's true parentage. And I'm aware of how vital this information is to you. As you know, my execution is scheduled for next month. And I'm running out of time. I want to trade this information with you. In exchange, you will grant me my freedom. Meet me within the private Prayer Room within the Grand Cathedral of the Scaled Lord at 2:00 PM. You will save me from my fate, or else”
